name: Intro
_source: s;Luther;We should stop here. This looks like the giant's hunting grounds.
s;Simon;Let's pause before advancing.{w} It's been a tough trek out here, and some of us are starting to tire.{w}{br}We need to be at our best before taking on the giant.
s;Luther;We must push forward.{w} This giant's life is already an insult to my legacy.{w}{br}Please, Simon. {w}We cannot let it get away.
s;Simon;Luther, wait.{w} You're breathing heavily.{w} I know you're fatigued too.{w}{br}I want to kill this giant. It's a threat to the surrounding land.{w}{br}But we can't just rush to our deaths.
s;Luther;Damn it!{w} If I just had a fraction of the strength I used to!
s;Simon;Luther, what's going on?{w} You've been on edge the entire time we've been traveling here.{w} You're not yourself.
s;Luther;Not myself is right!{w} I'd never falter like this in my youth.{w} Now please, we must keep moving.
s;Vincent;Simon, is everything okay?{w} I heard Luther yelling.
s;Simon;I'm not sure.{w} Everyone is tired, including him.{w}{br}But he keeps insisting we advance.{w}{br}I don't know what's gotten into him.
s;Vincent;Luther's been...{w} frustrated about what happened back at Castle Verstadt.{w}{br}I think he feels like he failed you.{w} Failed House Verstadt.
s;Simon;I've felt the same thing.{w} But he's been fine until now.
s;Vincent;Did you ever hear Luther's tales about slaying giants back in the day?
s;Simon;Some. He'd tell me those stories when I was a boy.

s;Vincent;He wouldn't shut up about it when we were on guard duty together.{w}{br}The man was a legend. A knight that even giants feared.{w} But...{w} that was a long time ago.{w}{br}He's not as strong as he was, and I think that's eating at him.{w}{br}And to add insult to injury, he hears word of a giant lurking near Verstadt lands.{w} Something he would never have let happen.
s;Simon;I see.{w} So he's exerting himself to the point of breaking,{w} all to prove to himself that he can still defend House Verstadt?
s;Simon;We should go after him.{w} I doubt we'll sway him while his mind is set.{w}{br}But we can at least try to prevent him from getting killed.
